Title: Paradex
Features: Paradex is an advanced Perpetuals DEX built on a high-performance Layer 2 network, engineered for Open Finance. Paradex is self-custodial, and their risk-engine (which is insanely optimized for capital efficiency) is on-chain, which means all the complex business logic that goes into derivative transactions is validated on the L2.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Paradex website.', '2. Connect your wallet and switch the network to Ethereum.', '3. Now complete trades.', '4. Users can receive 700,000 fixed points depending on the share of the total fee paying trading volume.', '5. Users who provide liquidity to Paradex order books will earn 300,000 points per week depending on their share of maker trading volume.', '6. Based on user activity, including open interest and TVL held, users can receive anywhere from 10 to 20 points.', '7. Click on “Earn” and find your referral link from the drop down menu.', '8. Users can earn 10% from invites, and they save 10%.', '9. For more details about the points program, visit this official announcement.', '10. There is also an affiliate program if you have referred over $50 million in 30 day volume or have 5,000+ social media followers.', '11. They don’t have a token yet, nor have they hinted about an airdrop.', '12. But those who collect points could potentially become eligible for an airdrop if they plan to launch one in the future.']

Title: Beranames
Features: Beranames is the official name service for Berachain, offering a human-readable address system for blockchain transactions. Users can mint unique NFT names, personalize their Berachain ID, and create subdomains for contracts, wallets, and more.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Beranames website.', '2. Mint your Beraname.', '3. Early users will get whitelisted to mint ahead of the mainnet.', '4. The more points you earn, the higher your minting priority.', '5. If you are a holder of the mentioned NFTs, you will receive a multiplier.', '6. 690,000 points are distributed weekly on Fridays.', '7. Earning points will make you eligible for an airdrop when Berachain goes live.', '8. For more information about the airdrop, visit this official announcement.']

Title: Grand Conquest
Features: Grand Conquest is a highly experimental and innovative fully onchain MMO grand strategy game that aims to push the boundaries of what is possible in the crypto gaming space.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Grand Conquest game page.', '2. Click on “Play Game.”', '3. Register your account and create your profile.', '4. Now play the game and complete quests to earn free points.', '5. Users who earn points by playing the games and completing quests will receive free GOLD airdrop.']

Title: Bit2
Features: Bit2 is a Layer 2 solution that utilizes WBTC (Wrapped Bitcoin) as its gas token, offering native yield by sharing sequencer fee profits with WBTC holders. It currently operates a Testnet+ and provides a platform for bridging assets, with plans for a full mainnet launch soon.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Bit2 website.', '2. Click on “Bridge Assets.”', '3. The testnet is a work in progress, and currently you can bridge your Ethereum and Wrapped Bitcoin.', '4. They have a points campaign coming soon.', '5. Interacting with the testnet might make you eligible for an airdrop if they plan to launch one in the future.', '6. Keep in mind that they don’t have a token yet and the chance for an airdrop is just speculation.']

Title: Swaye
Features: Swaye is a user generated prediction market with uncapped upside built on Base.
Guide: ['1. Visit Swaye, sign up using Twitter or Farcaster, and click on “Deposit”.', '2. Deposit ETH using the Base network. If you don’t hold any ETH, get some from Binance and/or bridge ETH to Base via Rhino.fi.', '3. Navigate the various prediction markets and pick one to place a trade.', '4. Select the amount of shares and click “Buy Now”.', '5. Early users who trade may qualify for a potential airdrop.', '6. Market creation on Swaye is permissionless. Create your own prediction market for another way to potentially qualify for a prospective airdrop.', '7. Click on your profile, then go to “Refer Frens” to get a unique referral code. Share this code with friends.', '8. For more information about Swaye, check out the FAQ page.', '9. Please note that no airdrop or token has been confirmed by Swaye, it’s only speculation.', '10. Follow Swaye on X for further updates.']

Title: Deek Network
Features: Deek (formerly Zeek) is a decentralized collaboration economy, backed by reputation and powered by innovative social bounty mechanics (aka “Wishes”). Individual behaviors and engagements contribute to the construction of a reputation layer (aka “Rizz”), which can be monetized and utilized to gauge credibility, reliability and influence.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Deek Network airdrop page.', '2. Connect your Twitter account.', '3. Join their Discord and verify.', '4. You will get 50 points.', '5. Now connect your wallet to the dashboard to earn Bonus points.', '6. Complete basic quests, including daily quests, to earn additional points.', '7. Also, earn more points by referring your friends.', '8. Download the mobile app via the browser to post questions or provide answers to questions submitted by others to earn rewards and badges.', '9. Users who collect points will get Deek badges based on points ranking.', '10. These badges will be converted into DEEK tokens after TGE. The TGE is expected to happen in Q3 2024.', '11. For more info about the airdrop, check the FAQ section on their Discord.']

Title: Saku Monsters
Features: Saku Monsters is a Web3-based game inspired by '90s RPGs and toys, offering players the experience of hatching and collecting over 150 unique monsters, each with distinct traits. Players compete, care for eggs, and earn rewards like Saku coins, with future phases introducing new gameplay features such as islands and battle modes.
Guide: ['1. Download the Saku Monsters Mobile app (Android/iOS).', '2. Sign up with your phone number or email address.', '3. Now play the game by hatching eggs, and maintaining it on a daily basis.', '4. Once your egg is hatched, you will earn a Saku Monster and Saku coins.', '5. They are currently in phase 3 of their game.', '6. Additionally, they have a Generation 1 monsters NFT. Holding one might potentially make you eligible for a bigger airdrop.', '7. They have hinted about a SAKU token airdrop in their recent tweet.', '8. Users who earn free Saku coins will potentially become eligible for the airdrop once they launch one.']

Title: SEAL
Features: Seal2Earn is a decentralized platform that allows users to stake their $SEAL tokens and earn Stable++ coins, a permissionless stablecoin based on RGB++. The project offers staking pools with a 30-day or 60-day lock period, during which stakers are rewarded based on the proportion of tokens they contribute.
Guide: ['1. Visit the SEAL website.', '2. Connect your JoyID, Unisat or OKX wallet.', '3. If you don’t have any SEAL tokens, get them from UTXO Swap.', '4. Ensure that you have at least 500 SEAL tokens.', '5. Enter the amount of SEAL that you want to stake and confirm.', '6. Upon transaction confirmation, your SEAL tokens will be locked for 7 days by BTC time lock.', '7. Once you confirm the transaction, your SEAL tokens will be locked for 60 days.', '8. After this period, both your earned STB and your unlocked SEAL will be automatically distributed to your L2 account in 48 hours.', '9. 70% of STB to be airdropped in Phases 3 + 4, for which the details will be announced later.', '10. For more details, visit this official airdrop announcement.']

Title: Fractal Bitcoin
Features: Fractal Bitcoin is the Bitcoin-native scaling solution designed to extend the power and potential of Bitcoin without compromising its core principles. Fractal leverages a recursive blockchain computing system that virtualizes Bitcoin Core, enabling infinite scalability while maintaining full consensus consistency with the Bitcoin main network
Guide: ['1. Visit the Fractal Mainnet Bootstrap program.', '2. This program is mainly for users who have actively participated and used UniSat and OKX Wallet services on the Bitcoin main network.', '3. To check whether you are eligible, scroll down on the program page and verify your qualification.', '4. You can check your eligibility for UniSat Wallet and OKX Wallet using the respective buttons.', '5. Visit the Pizzaswap website.', '6. Once BRC-20 is activated at Block 21000, users can swap Fractal BRC-20 assets easily. BTC can also be bridged to Fractal and back, using the brc-20 standard.', '7. Doing swaps might potentially make you eligible for an airdrop in the future if they plan to do one.', '8. Additionally, miners can participate in securing their network.', '9. Fractal Bitcoin is also running a developer ecosystem Treasury grant.', '10. For more information about the program, visit this official announcement.']

Title: Scroll Pump
Features: First platform for fair launch of memecoins on Scroll.
Guide: ['1. Visit Scroll Pump’s airdrop page and connect your wallet.', '2. Some ETH is required on the Scroll network to create or trade memecoins. Get some ETH from Binance, then bridge ETH from other networks to Scroll via Rhino.fi.', '3. Holders of the Scroll Origins NFT are eligible for PUMP tokens.', '4. Copy the unique referral link and invite friends to use Scroll Pump. For each invite that claims PUMP airdrop, referrers earn 500 PUMP tokens.', '5. Create and/or trade memecoins on Scroll Pump to potentially earn more PUMP tokens when the airdrop takes place.', '6. According to the website’s countdown timer, the PUMP token will be listed on September 16th, 2024.', '7. Follow Scroll Pump on X for further updates.']

Join Plaza Finance’s Discord, be active and join events to earn special roles, which may be a qualifier for their potential airdrop.', '3. Please note that an airdrop has not been confirmed by Plaza Finance, it’s only speculation.', '6. However, early users and supporters may be eligible for a potential PLAZA token.', '7. Follow Plaza Finance on X for further updates.']

Title: OP_NET
Features: OP_NET is a new metaprotocol operating outside the Ordinals envelope that is purpose-built to integrate seamlessly with Bitcoin while introducing a comprehensive suite of smart contract capabilities via Tapscript. At its core, OP_NET functions to transform the programmability of the Bitcoin blockchain into the programmability of smart contract blockchains, without any BIPs.
Guide: ['1. Visit the OP_NET testnet page.', '2. Download their wallet.', '3. Now, build, deploy or interact with the testnet.', '4. Visit MotoSwap testnet page and connect your wallet.', '5. Now swap or add liquidity to their pools.', '6. They haven’t confirmed an airdrop. But the users who interact with their testnet may get an airdrop when their token goes live in the future.']

Title: GasPump
Features: Launch a coin that is instantly tradeable for under $2 in one click (like Pump.fun, but on TON).

Additionally, users that create tokens attracting significant interest can earn 1000,000 Gas XP. The token must by purchased by at least 50 different wallets to qualify.', '9. Please note that an airdrop hasn’t been confirmed yet, it’s only speculation.', '12. Follow GasPump on X for further updates.']

Title: Arcium
Features: Arcium is a parallelized confidential computing network. It provides developers and applications with a trustless, verifiable, and efficient framework to run encrypted computations. Arcium aims to bring confidentiality to every on-chain application and become the global computing network for the decentralized internet.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Arcium Citadel campaign page.', '2. Click on “Begin Your Journey.”', '3. Complete the small quiz by choosing the right answer.', '4. Connect your wallet.', '5. Users get access to every fortress (opening once every week), deepening their knowledge about Arcium and having the chance to become highly recognized within the Arcium Citadel.', '6. There are four fortresses, and each of them is like a learning experience. The more you complete, the more opportunities you will gain.', '7. Once completed, you will earn an NFT.', '8. Interacting with the campaign might make you eligible for an airdrop if they plan to launch one in the future.', '9. Keep in mind that they don’t have a token yet and the chance for an airdrop is just speculation.']

Title: Asteria Finance

Also, join Asteria’s Discord and complete the tasks to gain access to Asteria’s guild.', '9. Follow Asteria on X for further updates.']

Title: BinStep

Title: Goldlink
Features: GoldLink Protocol is an institutional-grade on-chain prime brokerage that facilitates trustless, undercollateralized lending. The protocol aims to allow borrowers to execute a wide range of on-chain high-yield trading strategies while maximizing capital efficiency through leverage provided through individual strategy lending pools.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Goldlink yield program page.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Ensure to have GMX token in your wallet. If you don’t have any, get them on Binance.', '4. Now deposit into their GMX funding rate farming strategy.', '5. You will receive free yield every week.', '6. Goldlink will distribute 75,000 ARB tokens to the lenders.', '7. The rewards will be distributed weekly, and users will be able to claim their ARB rewards.', '8. Rewards will be distributed based on the share of total deposits a lending position represents over the course of the week.', '9. The program will continue until the full 75,000 ARB have been distributed.', '10. They have hinted in their doc about an audit and bug bounty program which could be launched soon.', '11. Goldlink has also announced that additional strategies to earn yields will be added, with a potential token launch in the future.', '12. In such a case, those who participate in this program could potentially become eligible for the airdrop if they plan to launch one.']

Title: Lombard
Features: Lombard is dedicated to expanding the digital economy by transforming Bitcoin’s utility from a mere store of value into a productive financial tool. Their flagship product, LBTC, is a secure Bitcoin liquid staked token (LST), designed to empower anyone—from individual holders to large institutions—to amplify the utility of their Bitcoin. It allows users to earn a native yield from providing economic security to networks via Babylon and participate in DeFi, all while maintaining the value of the original asset.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Lombard dApp page.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. You will need BTC. You can get it from Binance.', '4. Now click on “Stake BTC”.', '5. Now stake directly by sending BTC to the provided address or stake via the shown BTC wallet.', '6. You will get their LST token LBTC after staking BTC.', '7. You will start earning yield as well as points in the form of Lombard Lux for staking BTC.', '8. Go to “DeFi” and provide liquidity with your LBTC to earn multipliers on points.', '9. Additionally, Gearbox Protocol has launched Leverage Lombard Finance’s LBTC to access native BTC yields through Babylon and earn 3X boosted Lux.', '10. They don’t have their own token, so the users who stake BTC and collect Lux may get an airdrop if their token goes live in the future.', '11. For more information regarding the campaign, see this page.']

Title: Kwenta

Title: PopCoin
Features: PopCoin is the first tap-to-earn Telegram game on HyperLiquid. Users can engage in bubble-popping games and maximize their claiming power by popping bubbles and earning rewards at the same time.
Guide: ['1. Visit the PopCoin website.', '2. Click on “Select Wallet” and sign up.', '3. Verify your wallet address via Telegram by choosing the second option.', '4. Now begin playing the game by popping bubbles and accumulating pop-count.', '5. You receive free bubbles daily under a ‘daily free quota’ that is subject to decrease over time.', '6. Title: predict.fun
Features: The yield-bearing prediction market built on Blast.
Guide: ['1. Visit predict.fun and connect your wallet.', '2. Some ETH and USDB are required on the Blast network. Get some ETH from Binance or alternatively, use Rhino.fi to bridge funds to the Blast network.', '3. Go to “Deposit” on predict.fun’s landing page and deposit USDB to the address shown.', '4. After depositing USDB, place some limit orders to start earning points and Blast Gold.', '5. For the month of September, predict.fun will distribute a total of 879,765 Blast Gold. Blast Gold is automatically distributed once per month.', '6. Random snapshots of every market’s order book are taken in very short intervals throughout the day.', '7. If a user’s limit order exists on the order book at the time of a snapshot, it is able to earn points from the points allocated to that snapshot. When a bid or ask is accepted, it stops earning points.', '8. Note that only the top 5 bids and asks in each market at each snapshot will earn points.', '9. Also, an order must be live on an order book for at least 5 minutes to become eligible to earn points.', '10. For more information about the points program, check out the docs.', '11. While users can earn Blast gold, please note that no predict.fun airdrop has been confirmed by the team, it’s only speculation.', '12. Follow predict.fun on X for further updates.']

Title: Grass
Features: Grass is a network sharing application that allows users to sell their unused bandwidth. Where existing networks are operated by exploitative middlemen who extract value from the parties exchanging resources, Grass is an equitable solution in which both sides have an active stake in the network.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Grass airdrop eligibility checking page.', '2. Connect the Solana wallet you’ve connected to the Grass airdrop page.', '3. Then click on “Check Eligibility”.', '4. The bonus epoch is still ongoing so continue to earn points to be eligible for the airdrop.', '8. The claim will go live after the network goes live.', '9. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this tweet.', '10. Visit the Grass registration page.', '11. Submit your details and sign up.', '12. You will need an invite code to be able to sign up so make sure to sign up using the above link.', '13. Now login and click on “Connect” to download their extension.', '14. Go to your profile and verify your mail.', '15. Install the extension and log in with the same credentials.', '16. Once you are connected, you will start earning Grass points.', '17. You will earn points while browsing the internet.', '18. Grass enables you to earn passive income by selling your unused bandwidth while keeping your privacy intact.', '19. Download the desktop app to participate in the limited time bonus epoch.', '20. Also get 20% of the referred friends’ points, 10% from the secondary referee’s points and 5% from tertiary referees’ points.', '21. The referral will be considered successful only if the referred user has a minimum uptime of 100 hours on Grass.', '22. In a recent announcement, Grass stated that users can now link their Solana wallet addresses to their Grass accounts. Read the announcement to understand why this is important.']

Title: Skate
Features: Skate is revolutionizing the development of Stateless Apps that run simultaneously on all chains with a single state, eliminating the traditional "fork-everywhere" model and boosting efficiency. With the launch on TON, users can now participate in the Skate airdrop by crafting Skates using the Skateboard Workshop Bot on Telegram.
Guide: ['1. Start by opening the Skateboard Workshop Bot on Telegram. This is your gateway to collecting and crafting Skates.', '2. Collect skateboard parts—trucks, wheels, and decks—by minting them. In the bot, click ‘Mint Now.’ You’ll randomly receive a skateboard part NFT on the TON chain.', '3. Once you’ve collected enough truck, wheel, and deck NFTs, go to the inventory tab in the bot. Use your collected parts to build a skateboard NFT. Each completed skateboard NFT will earn you 1,000 Ollies points.', '4. To be eligible for Ollies on your EVM Wallet, you must complete the ‘Build a Skateboard’ task on Galxe before minting skateboard NFTs.', '5. Choose your destination chain in the dApp, click ‘Mint Now,’ and receive a random skateboard part NFT on the selected chain.', '6. Once you’ve gathered enough part NFTs from multiple chains, navigate to the inventory tab, select the parts, and mint your skateboard NFT to recieve 500 Ollies.', '7. Points will be distributed based on the number of skateboard NFTs you build. The more NFTs you craft, the more Ollies points you’ll accumulate.', '8. Follow Skate on X for the latest updates, announcements, and further details on how to maximize your airdrop rewards']

For more information, visit this official announcement.', '12. They don’t have a token yet, but could launch one in the future.', '13. Collecting XP might potentially make you eligible for an airdrop if they play to launch one.', '14. However, there is no guarantee; its only speculation.']

Guide: ['1. Visit the Battle Showdown: Gambit airdrop page.', '2. Connect your Twitter account.', '3. You will get 100 points.', '4. Go to “Referrals” and enter code “m8ozq7” to get a bonus of 1,000 points.', '5. Now connect your Base wallet to get another 100 points.', '6. Now, start doing on-chain and social tasks to earn more points.', '7. You can earn on-chain points by making trades as mentioned on the airdrop page. The points you earn will be based on the number of trades and trade volume.', '8. You can earn social points by completing the social tasks mentioned on the airdrop page.', '9. You can also earn a multiplier on your points for holding the mentioned NFTs.', '10. Also, earn 1,000 points for each successful referral that earns 5,000 points.', '11. All the earned points will be compounded daily for bonus points.', '12. A portion of the ELS supply will be airdropped to users who collect points.', '13. Users must pass the Eligibility criteria as well as Allocation criteria to be eligible for the airdrop.', '14. You must maintain a minimum balance of 1,000 WELS or 0.01 ETH in your registered wallet on the Base chain and undergo FailSafe’s AI-powered anti-sybil checks to meet the eligibility criteria.', '15. You need to have a historical transaction volume of at least 500 WELS on the Gambit Finance Platform and/or make at least 30 transactions with your registered wallet on the Base chain to fulfill the Allocation criteria.', '16. To receive the full allocation, you must meet both of the Allocation criteria mentioned above. If you meet only one of the criteria, you will qualify for only 30% of your total allocation.', '17. A snapshot of the eligible users will be taken at an undisclosed time close to the airdrop date. For more information regarding the eligibility criteria, see this article.', '18. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article.']

Pool 1: 1 EMC = ~ 0,18045 EMT', '10. EMT holders will also have access to additional benefits.', '11. Head over to their official announcement to find more details.']

Title: Acre

Title: Pear Protocol

To get some ETH and/or USDC, head to Binance and withdraw to your wallet via Arbitrum.', '3. Visit Pear Protocol and connect your wallet.', '4. Pear Protocol allows users to place “pair trades” for crypto markets. For example, if a user if bullish on SOL but bearish on ETH, they can create a SOL-ETH pair and go long.', '6. There are three volume tiers: trade more than $5,000, more than $25,000 and more than $50,000.', '7. After trading more than the volume threshold of each tier, head to the airdrop tab from the dashboard and click “Check Task”.', '8. Then claim the soulbound NFT.', '9. Users can claim up to 3 soulbound NFTs for each volume tier.', '10. The list of wallets that qualify will be closed on October 9th (6 weeks from the start of the campaign).', '11. Follow Pear Protocol on X for further updates.']

Title: Jupiter
Features: Jupiter is the key liquidity aggregator for Solana, offering the widest range of tokens and the best route discovery between any token pair. They aim to provide the most friendly UX for users and the most powerful tools for developers to allow them to easily access the best-in-class swap in their application, interface or on-chain programs.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Jupiter website.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Jupiter has launched a new referral program for its users.', '4. The new program allows users to earn free referral fees by bringing new users to swap on the platform.', '5. Scroll down and click on “Referral” to create the referral link.', '6. Set the fees that you want to implement (up to 1%) and set the tokens you want to earn fees on.', '7. Users who’ve staked JUP and have actively participated in voting can also claim “Active Staking Rewards“.', '8. ASR Pool consists of the 0.75% LFG Launchpad fee and 100M JUP from JUP’s usage of the LFG Launchpad. The 100M JUP is distributed over two quarters, the first of which is this ASR Claim. In addition to the 50M JUP, you will get WEN, ZEUS, SHARK, and UPT.', '9. The first set of eligible users had until August 6th, at 1 PM UTC / 9 AM EST to claim the tokens.', '10. The next ASR claim will be in early October. For more info, see this tweet.', '11. There will also be future airdrops to Jupiter users in which the remaining 30% of the supply will be distributed in 3 rounds.', '12. So continue interacting with the platform and users who swap, bridge and trade on the platform may get future airdrops.', '13. Also, attend the weekly planetary call by Jupiter and Meow and scan the QR code at the end to collect NFTs. You must have staked at least 50 JUP to be eligible. You could become eligible for JUP airdrops for collecting these NFTs.', '14. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this tweet.']

Title: Abstract
Features: Abstract is an Ethereum L2 designed for consumer facing applications across DeFi, SocialFi, NFTs, and more. Abstract is built on top of Ethereum using the ZK Stack. Abstract leverages advanced zero-knowledge cryptography to build a scalable blockchain that looks and feels like Ethereum, but with lower costs and higher throughput.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Abstract testnet bridge page.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Change the network to Ethereum Sepolia testnet.', '4. You will need some testnet ETH. You can get Sepolia ETH from here.', '5. Now bridge ETH from Sepolia to Abstract testnet.', '6. Also, bridge it back to Sepolia.', '7. Deposits from L1 to L2 take around ~15 minutes and withdrawals from L2 to L1 currently take up to 24 hours.', '8. For more information regarding the testnet, see this page.', '9. They don’t have their own token yet, but users who interact with the testnet bridge may get an airdrop if they launch their own token.']

Title: deBridge
Features: deBridge is a generic messaging and cross-chain interoperability protocol that enables decentralized transfers of arbitrary data and assets between various blockchains. The validation of cross-chain transactions is performed by a network of independent validators who are elected by and work for the deBridge governance.
Guide: ['1. Visit the deBridge website.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Click on the “Season 1 Eligibility Checker” banner.', '4. Now, you will be redirected to the deBridge foundation page.', '5. Enter your wallet address and click on “Check Eligibility”.', '6. If you’re eligible, then you will see the number of tokens you’re eligible to claim.', '7. Now click on “Sign Terms and Conditions” and submit your Solana wallet address to receive the tokens when the claim goes live.', '8. Users who’ve interacted with the deBridge and collected points by July 23rd, 2024 at 21:00 UTC are eligible for the Season 1 airdrop.', '9. A total of 6% of the total supply has been allocated for the Season 1 airdrop.', '10. The claim will go live once DBR becomes tradable on DEXes and CEXes, 48 hours after the Alpha LFG vault closes.', '11. Season 2 has also begun, so continue to interact with deBridge as mentioned below to be eligible for future airdrops.', '12. deBridge currently supports 11 blockchain networks such as Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, and Polygon.', '13. Make cross-chain swaps on deBridge and any partner application.', '14. You will get 100 points for every $1 paid in fees to the deBridge protocol.', '15. The more you bridge, the higher the points you will get.', '16. Also, get 25% of the points from each referral.', '17. For more information regarding the Season 1 airdrop details, read this article.']

Title: LazyOtter
Features: LazyOtter helps users navigate the world of decentralised finance (DeFi) safely with risk-layered vaults that have been audited by SlowMist. Their vision is to leverage artificial intelligence, real-time risk analysis and automated emergency withdrawals to make DeFi more secure for non-technical users. LazyOtter are winners of the second prize in Bybit and Moledao's Demo Day #5 and are also supported by Scroll, OneSavie Lab and Hailstone Ventures.
Guide: ['1. Head to LazyOtter’s app here.', '2. Connect your wallet and switch the network to Scroll.', '3. You’ll need some ETH and/or USDC to deposit into LazyOtter’s risk-layered vaults.', '4. Go to the “Vault” page.', '5. Click on the AAVE USDC vault or the AAVE ETH vault.', '6. Input the deposit amount and click on “Deposit”.', '7. Sign the transaction with your wallet.', '8. As well as a potential LazyOtter airdrop, Scroll Marks can be earned from the underlying protocols.', '9. Keep your funds in the vault for as long as possible. Deposits earn 1 Otter point per $1 every day.', '10. Deposit assets into new vaults once they launch. Another qualifier or multiplier could be users who have deposited into multiple vaults.', '11. Invite friends using a referral link. Earn a 20% bonus on all points invitees earn.', '12. Also, interact with their testnet and submit feedback in the Discord channel.', '13. LazyOtter’s roadmap indicates a token generation event in Q4 2024 (or beyond).', '14. However, please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop to the early users of the platform. It’s only speculation.']

Title: Orange Finance
Features: Orange Finance is an automated liquidity management protocol at the forefront of LPDfi innovation in the DeFi space. Their mission is to simplify liquidity provision and enhance profitability within LPDfi protocols.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Orange Finance points campaign page.', '2. Connect your wallet and sign the message.', '3. Connect your X account.', '4. Click on “Events” to find different tasks to complete and earn points.', '5. Also, refer your friends to earn 5 points for each referral. You’ll receive an additional 10% of the point airdrops earned by the users you refer.', '6. For more information about the campaign, visit this official announcement.', '7. The snapshot of the points will happen on August 13th at 1 PM (UTC).']

Title: ISC Money
Features: Solana-native, yield-bearing stablecoin engineered to preserve and grow wealth against inflation.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Prospera page and connect your Solana wallet.', '2. Purchase at least 1 ISC through Jupiter.', '3. Connect your social accounts and sign up for the email list.', '4. Refer friends using a unique referral link.', '5. Complete tasks for Save Finance, Meteora, and Jupiter by using or swapping ISC via these protocols.', '6. ISC have confirmed an airdrop of INTL tokens to early users.', '7. 40% of the INTL supply will be allocated to community-driven projects and rewards', '8. Follow ISC Money on X for further updates.']

Title: Loop
Features: Loop is a dedicated lending market for Ethereum carry trades. Users can supply a long tail of Liquid Restaking derivatives (e.g., Pendle LP tokens) as collateral to borrow ETH for increased yield and points exposure
Guide: ['1. Visit the Loop website.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Ensure to have ETH or WETH in your wallet. If you don’t have any, get them on Binance.', '4. Now deposit ETH or liquid restaking tokens to start earning points (Quaaloops).', '5. You can also refer your friends to earn 20% of the points given to the depositor.', '6. At TGE, 7% of the supply will be distributed among the participants depending on the number of points earned.', '7. For more details about the airdrop, visit this official announcement.']

Title: Shardeum
Features: Shardeum is an EVM based L1 that uses dynamic state sharding to achieve linearly scalability while attaining atomic composability across shards. This means Shardeum can increase its TPS capacity with each validator added to the network to retain low fees forever. Shardeum provides the highest throughput capacity of any EVM based L1 without sacrificing on decentralization. Developers can deploy and interact with Solidity or Vyper contracts without special considerations for sharding, since contracts are deployed to unique shards automatically while retaining atomic composability across all shards.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Shardeum testnet campaign page.', '2. Connect your wallet and change the network to Shardeum Atomium testnet.', '3. Now complete the simple Stage 2 quests to earn XPs.', '4. Go to Stage 2 Level 1 quest and enter “airdropsio” in the friend’s code field.', '5. Stage 2 includes a total of 4 levels of quests. Complete more quests to earn more XPs.', '6. Click on “Validator Quest” and complete validator task to earn more XPs.', '7. You will need testnet SHM to do onchain quests. You can get testnet SHM from their Discord channel.', '8. Also, get up to 50 XP from each referral.', '9. They’ve confirmed that they’ll airdrop 3,296,500 SHM to the incentivized campaign participants. For more information, read this article.', '10. Users who collect XPs will get SHM airdrop after the token goes live.', '11. For more info regarding the campaign, read this article.']

Title: Sonic Labs
Features: Sonic is a layer-1 platform with a secure gateway to Ethereum and provides the fastest settlement layer for digital assets with over 10,000 TPS and has a one-second confirmation time for transactions. The ecosystem will be supported by a massive incentive program.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Sonic Labs: The Road to Sonic Galxe campaign page.', '2. Log in to Galxe with your X, Discord, email or wallet address.', '3. Complete various tasks to earn free Sonic Shards NFTs.', '4. Participate in the weekly series to collect six of these NFTs.', '5. Once you’ve collected all six shards, you can combine them to create an exclusive, special NFT.', '6. For more information about the airdrop, visit this official airdrop announcement.']

Title: Duper
Features: Duper is a wagering social war game. Set on a faraway desert planet, 5 players build up their armory, compete to take over territories, forge alliances, and backstab each other to earn money. A game session typically lasts 30-45 minutes.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Duper website.', '2. Submit your email and sign up.', '3. Verify your mail and log in.', '4. You will get 100 points in the form of Sparks.', '5. Click on “Lootboox” and connect your socials to claim a Lootbox. Each Lootbox opens up to an Emblem or Sparks. Lootboxes are not transferrable. Lootboxes can be opened at the end of Season I as Emblems are revealed.', '6. Now go to “Play” and play the game.', '7. Start with the “Playground” to learn the game.', '8. To play the ranked game, you will need 0.005 ETH. You will need to transfer some Arbitrum ETH into your Duper Privy wallet and deposit it into the game contract to play a Ranked game. You can get ETH from Binance.', '9. You will earn Sparks for playing the game.', '10. Go to “Quests” and complete the tasks to earn more Sparks.', '11. Also, invite your friends to earn even more Sparks.', '12. Duper has also opened weekly reward drops for its users. Check the home page to find out about the drops.', '13. They don’t have their own token yet, but users who collect Sparks will likely get an airdrop if their token goes live.', '14. For more information regarding the campaign, see this page.']

Title: KAYEN Protocol
Features: KAYEN Protocol is a community-driven DeFi ecosystem built on Chiliz Chain. Starting from the cornerstone product, KayenSwap—the Chiliz-native DEX—KAYEN is dedicated to the continuous development of its ecosystem with additional features such as Launchpad and RWA NFT Marketplace.
Guide: ['1. Visit the KAYEN League page.', '2. Connect your wallet and switch to Chiliz network.', '3. Now complete various social tasks from their page.', '4. You will earn free points for completing the tasks.', '5. Invite your friends to earn 5% of all points from valid users you refer.', '6. The team has confirmed that the points will make you eligible for KAYEN airdrop.']

Title: Meso Finance
Features: Meso Finance is a decentralized, non-custodial, pool-based lending platform built on the Aptos designed to provide users with efficient and secure lending services. Meso Finance enables users to supply assets to earn interest and borrow against them to unlock liquidity.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Meso Finance website.', '2. Connect your Aptos wallet like Pontem.', '3. You will need some APT and/or other tokens on Aptos. You can get APT from Binance.', '4. Now supply assets to Meso Finance.', '5. Also, try to borrow some tokens.', '6. You will start earning points for supplying and borrowing on the platform.', '7. Go to “Points” and complete on-chain tasks as well as social tasks to earn more points.', '8. Also, get more points for inviting your friends.', '9. They don’t have a token yet, but users who collect points may get an airdrop if they launch their own token.']

Title: Shieldeum
Features: Shieldeum produces Secure Computing Power for 440 million Crypto Users by AI powered Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Network (DePIN).
Guide: ['1. Visit the Shieldeum Airdrop Page.', '2. Login with either Telegram, Google or X (Twitter) accounts.', '3. Start doing tasks like following us on X and joining their Telegram group.', '4. Earn points and checkout the live leaderboard; the more points you earn, the bigger your portion of the airdrop will be.', '5. You can also invite your friends to earn free points.', '6. The airdrop will be distributed after TGE.']

Title: PancakeSwap
Features: PancakeSwap is a decentralised exchange available on multiple chains. As part of zkSync's airdrop #1, PancakeSwap received just over 2.4 million ZK tokens.
Guide: ['1. Visit the PancakeSwap Quest page.', '2. Connect your wallet and switch to BNB Chain.', '3. Click on “Start The Quest.”', '4. Set up your DeFi profile.', '5. Complete the various social tasks mentioned on the quest page.', '6. For more details about the quest, visit their official announcement.', '7. Head to PancakeSwap, connect your wallet and ensure you’re on the zkSync Era network.', '8. Go to “Swap”. Regularly swap between tokens on zkSync for a chance to earn ZK.', '9. Go to “Liquidity” and provide liquidity. Most of the ZK tokens will be allocated to liquidity providers.', '10. veCAKE holders and past users have until August 5, 2024 (10:30 UTC) to claim their ZK tokens. To claim ZK rewards, visit PancakeSwap and a claim window will be shown.', '11. See this official announcement for more details.']

Title: Zircuit
Features: Zircuit is a fully EVM-compatible zero-knowledge rollup powering the limitless potential of web3. Backed by pioneering L2 research, the network’s unique hybrid architecture combines battle-tested infrastructure with zero-knowledge proofs to give developers the best of both worlds. With cutting-edge performance and security at the sequencer level, users can explore new frontiers with faster transactions, reduced fees, and complete peace of mind.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Zircuit staking page.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Click on “Airdrop claim”.', '4. If you’re eligible then you will be able to claim free ZRC tokens.', '5. Users who’ve interacted with the Season 1 points campaign and collected points by staking tokens are eligible for the airdrop.', '6. A total of 7% of the total ZRC supply is allocated for Season 1 points earners.', '7. After you claim the ZRC token, it may take up to 24 hours to arrive in your wallet. It is currently non-transferable until Mainnet Phase 2.', '8. They’ve also launched the Mainnet festival, which will award 20,000,000 ZRC. Bridge ETH and test Zircuit to be eligible for rewards. Users can earn at least 125% in ZRC for all ETH spent on gas and have a chance to win further prizes, such as a super prize of 100,000 ZRC.', '9. Season 2 has also begun and an additional 14% of ZRC is allocated for future staking and usage-based rewards.', '10. So, continue to interact with Zircuit as mentioned below to be eligible for future airdrops.', '11. You will need some ETH or other LST tokens. You can get ETH from Binance.', '12. Zircuit currently supports ETH, wETH, rswETH, rsETH, ezETH, stETH and LsETH.', '13. Now, stake your tokens.', '14. You will start earning yield on your staked asset as well as Zircuit points and EigenLayer points.', '15. You will also earn points for deploying and interacting with contracts and sending transactions.', '16. Also, earn 15% of the points from each referral.', '17. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article.']

Title: Tari
Features: Tari is the end-state blockchain protocol
Guide: ['1. Visit the Tari airdrop page.', '2. Log in with X and connect your Twitter account to start completing quests and earning rewards.', '3. Complete the first two eligibility quests to earn points in the form of “Gems”.', '4. Move on to the ongoing quests to earn maximum gems.', '5. You get 1,000 gems for each referral who joins and completes the first two eligibility quests.', '6. By owning Gen 0 or Gen 1 Yats, you can earn the ultra-rare ‘Turtle Shells’ and legendary ‘Sky Hammers’, which increase your gems and airdrop.', '7. Your collection of items will be converted to XTM tokens when the claim period goes live.', '8. Tari has announced that it is launching Tari Universe, their simple mining app.', '9. Users can submit the details here and join the waitlist to try it on Testnet.', '10. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article.']

Title: GRVT
Features: GRVT is a hybrid crypto derivatives exchange (HEX), offering self-custody trading, lightning-fast execution, deep liquidity, capital efficiency, and competitive fees. They cater to both professional and novice traders with two distinct trading modes. Powered by zkSync technology, GRVT leverages zk-rollups for unparalleled security and scalability.
Guide: ['1. Visit the GRVT website.', '2. Click on “Join the Open Beta Testnet”.', '3. Now submit your details and sign up.', '4. Now click on “Create wallet” and create your testnet funding wallet by connecting your wallet.', '5. Now mint testnet USDT.', '6. Transfer testnet USDT to the funding account.', '7. Now, make testnet trades on the platform.', '8. Also, verify your account to earn the Open Beta Welcome Rewards campaign. The first 30,000 to verify on GRVT: earn 80 $ZK tokens and 20 Mystery Box raffle tickets.', '9. A total of 11% of GRVT’s total token supply has been allocated for the airdrop for the first 18 months after their mainnet launch.', '10. For more info regarding the campaign, see this tweet.', '11. An additional 2.4M ZK tokens have been allocated to the first 30,000 participants who join the open beta testnet. For more info, see this tweet.']

Title: DeBank
Features: DeBank is a dashboard for tracking your DeFi portfolio, with data and analytics for decentralized lending protocols, stablecoins, margin trading platforms and DEXes.
Guide: ['1. Visit the DeBank XP page.', '2. Click on “Visit the DeBank page“.', '3. Then click on “Login” and connect your wallet.', '4. Now go to the “XP page”, submit the referral code “171078” and claim your XP.', '5. Active on-chain address in 2024 (initiated at least one transaction) and users who were active on DeBank in 2024 with assets greater than $0 based on a snapshot taken on July 4th (UTC+0) at 0:00 are eligible to claim free XP.', '6. Initial XPs are based on the wallet on-chain assets, Credit, and Web3 Social Ranking on DeBank.', '7. Complete “Quests” to earn more XPs.', '8. Also, get 50 XP from each referral.', '9. The DeBank initial XP claim will end on August 4th, 0:00 (UTC+0). At that time, the ability to claim New User Referral XP will also cease. You can still earn more XP by completing and referring Quests on DeBank.', '10. It’s very likely that they will launch their own token in the future and do an airdrop to users who collect XPs.', '11. Also, Mint a Web3 ID and also go to “Badges” and mint the badges you’re eligible to claim. Claiming badges could prevent your wallet from being identified as a Sybil.', '12. Also, install the Rabby wallet, click on “Ecology”,  bridge ETH from Mainnet to DBK chain and then mint the Genesis NFT.', '13. For more information regarding the XP campaign, see this tweet.']

Title: Spaace
Features: Spaace is the leading gamified NFT marketplace and aggregator, offering a unique community-centric trading experience with 100% revenue sharing in ETH. The platform aims to revolutionize NFT trading through innovative gamification and rewards, supporting and empowering creators and their communities.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Spaace airdrop page.', '2. Sign in using your X account.', '3. Complete various tasks to earn free SPAACE points.', '4. Click on “Invite Friends” to find your referral link.', '5. You earn 10% of the points earned by your direct referrals. Additionally, you can earn 5% of the points earned by users referred by your direct referrals.']

Title: Mezo
Features: Mezo is an economic layer for Bitcoin designed for user ownership, reliable bridging with tBTC, BTC for gas and EVM compatibility. The team has over a decade of previous experience building on Bitcoin, including tBTC, Fold and Keep Network. The project is backed by Pantera Capital, Ledger's early stage venture fund and others, while the smart contracts have been audited by Quanstamp and Thesis Defense.
Guide: ['1. Head to the Mezo portal.', '2. Deposits are available via the Bitcoin network (BTC) and the Ethereum mainnet (WBTC, tBTC, crvUSD, USDe, USDC and other stablecoins).', '3. For the Bitcoin network, a Unisat or OKX Wallet is required to connect to the portal.', '4. Also, some Bitcoin is required to lock up and increase the HODL score. You can buy some BTC on Binance. If you don’t have any crypto funds, you can also directly deposit fiat to Binance and purchase BTC.', '5. For Ethereum mainnet, connect with a wallet here to deposit WBTC, tBTC or stablecoins. If you don’t hold the supported tokens, you can buy WBTC, tBTC and other eligible assets on Binance.', '6. More points can be earned by depositing BTC, WBTC and tBTC as compared to stablecoins. More information on the HODL Score can be found here.', '7. Enter an invite code. You can get one from the cod hub channel in their Discord server.', '8. Select the asset and choose a lock-up period of 2 months, 6 months or 9 months.', '9. More points will be earned for longer lock-up periods.', '10. 5 single-use invite codes are given to users who deposit more than 0.01 BTC, which offer a 3x points boost.', '11. A custom Mezo name can be unlocked for deposits over 0.05 BTC.', '12. Swell swBTC deposits are now open. Users can earn 2x mats boost and Swell black pearls.', '13. Follow Mezo on X for further updates.', '14. Mezo may potentially reward high HODL scores with the upcoming MEZO token.', '15. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop. It’s only speculation.']

Title: The Vault
Features: The Vault stake pool will strive to bring the financial stake in-line with the existing social stake of Solana-centric communities. The Vault will maintain, and continue to curate, a list of validators that are associated with Solana-centric communities. Within the allowlisted groups, a scoring system will be used to optimize returns for LST holders.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Vault website.', '2. Connect your Solana wallet.', '3. You will need some SOL. You can get it from Binance.', '4. Now, stake SOL on the platform.', '5. You will get vSOL, which is the liquid staked SOL token.', '6. Now go to the points section and stake vSOL.', '7. You will start earning points on top of the staking rewards.', '8. Also provide liquidity to the Saber SOL-vSOL pool and stake the LP tokens to earn more points.', '9. They’ve confirmed to airdrop their future governance token to users who collect points.', '10. For more information regarding the points program, see this page.']

Title: Movement
Features: Movement Labs is bringing Move execution to new networks and environments. Their flagship products are M1 and M2. They are also building the Movement SDK, Movement CLI, Fractal, Hyperlane messaging infrastructure, and the Movement Shared Sequencer to provide paramount interoperability between our Move-based environments and other networks.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Movements Galxe Quest page.', '2. Log in with your X, Discord or email address.', '3. Now complete easy social tasks to earn free points.', '4. Visit their testnet page.', '5. Connect your wallet and explore their testnet page.', '6. They also have a community program where users can participate in various activities.', '7. Users can earn special perks for participating and earning points.', '8. For more details about the program, visit this official announcement.', '9. They don’t have their own token but could launch one in the future.', '10. Users who collect points will likely get an airdrop if their token goes live.', '11. Movement has announced their incentivized testnet program called the MoveDrop.', '12. The MoveDrop has four different pieces.', '13. Visit the MoveDrop homepage.', '14. There is a campaign called The Battle of Olympus for developers. This hackathon is for developers who can build DeFi, gaming and entertainment tools.', '15. The second campaign is called Building the Parthenon, which is for everyone. Participants can participate in Galxe quests and start earning free XP.', '16. The third campaign is called Gmove campaign where users can earn trophies for saying ‘gmove” on X.', '17. For more details about the campaign and the fourth campaign, visit this official announcement.']

Title: Shaga
Features: Shaga is pioneering a revolution in cloud gaming by offering ultra-low latency and high-performance gameplay on any smart device through a decentralized, permissionless network leveraging Solana.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Shaga quest page.', '2. Connect your X account.', '3. Select your city.', '4. Now go to Quests and complete various tasks, including the “Spin Me” daily quest.', '5. You will earn free GLOB points for completing the tasks.', '6. Additionally, you can click on your profile on the upper right hand side to find your referral link.', '7. Every invite that marks their glob gets 1000 GLOB points for the referrer as well as the referred user.', '8. They don’t have a token yet but could launch one in the future.', '9. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop to early users or launch their own token. It’s only speculation.']

Title: Elixir
Features: Elixir is a modular DPoS network built to power liquidity on orderbook exchanges. Elixir is cross chain and composable: enabling orderbook DEXs to natively integrate Elixir into their core infrastructure to unlock retail liquidity for pairs, among other exciting use-cases. The network serves as crucial underlying infrastructure allowing for exchanges and protocols to easily bootstrap liquidity to their books.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Elixir webiste.', '2. Connect your Ethereum or Sui wallet.', '3. Link your Twitter and Discord accounts.', '4. Now click on “Mint ELXETH”.', '5. Now, you will be able to unlock a Mystic chest.', '6. You will need to supply at least $100 in USDC to an Elixir-powered product on an exchange listed here or to native integrations listed here.', '7. You can also deposit at least $100 worth of ETH to mint elxETH at mainnet to be able to unlock the Mystic chest. You will also receive a 50% boost on earned potions for minting elxETH.', '8. Quantum pools are also live if you want to hit both the potential Elixir airdrop and confirmed Orderly airdrop at the same time. Deposit USDC here for a 2-for-1 airdrop strategy.', '9. Elixir has also launched deUSD, a synthetic dollar. Users who stake deUSD or stake deUSD LP tokens to Elixir will get a 5x boost to potions. You can get deUSD from Curve.', '10. Users who choose to mint deUSD will receive a “Cultist Multiplier”: an additional 2x multiplier for potions earned from elxETH in Season 1. You will also continue to earn a max 5x boost through Season 2, while those who don’t mint will continue earning potions at 1.5x (50% boost).', '11. You will also start earning points in the form of potions for supplying assets.', '12. Also, interact with the other projects on Elixir to earn more potions.', '13. You will get an extra 10% boost on your potions if you sign up using the above link.', '14. Also refer your friends to earn 10% of the potions from each referral.', '15. The potions you’ve earned will only be updated every 24hrs.', '16. Season 1 of the campaign has ended after the launch of deUSD and Season 2 has begun.', '17. For more information regarding the Apothecary potions campaign, see this tweet.', '18. They’ve confirmed to launch their own token “ELX” in the future so users who collect potions will likely get an airdrop when their token goes live.', '19. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop. It’s only speculation.', '20. Elixir has launched their Testnet v3. This is the final testnet before their mainnet launch.', '21. Users can run a validator and secure the network to participate.']

Title: Stride
Features: Stride is a blockchain that provides liquidity for staked assets. Using Stride, users can earn both staking and DeFi yields across the Cosmos IBC ecosystem. Stride is built using Cosmos SDK and Tendermint and created with Ignite. Stride allows users to liquid stake any IBC-compatible cosmos SDK native appchain token.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Stride airdrop claim page.', '2. Connect your Cosmos wallet.', '3. If you’re eligible then you will be able to claim free STRD tokens.', '4. Users who staked TIA on Stride and held stTIA from February to June are eligible for the airdrop.', '5. A total of 5,000,000 STRD has been allocated for the airdrop.', '6. The allocated STRD tokens are unlocked linearly over 180 days. Eligible users can claim STRD every day if they want or leave it for a few days to claim all unclaimed STRD from previous days.', '7. There’s also an instant unlock option to get your full STRD allocation immediately but users must forfeit 30% of their share. Guide: ['1. Visit the Ancient8 airdrop claim page.', '2. Connect your wallet to claim your A8 tokens.', '3. If you are eligible, you will be able to claim your tokens.', '4. The airdrop claim will be open until August 17, 2024, 9 AM UTC.', '5. Users can also stake their A8 tokens from their staking page.', '6. Access the Ancient8 airdrop leaderboard landing page.', '7. Connect your wallet and complete the daily check-in.', '8. Connect your email, Discord, Telegram and X accounts.', '9. Share your referral link to earn more points.', '10. Bridge at least $50 from any chain using Relay Protocol. Check out Ancient8’s tutorial on how to bridge for a complete walkthrough.', '11. Complete the other Ancient8 missions listed on the airdrop leaderboard landing page.', '12. Complete the missions listed on the airdrop leaderboard landing page for each game.', '13. For more information about Ancient8’s airdrop, please refer to the official announcement.']

Title: Usual
Features: Usual is a multi-chain infrastructure that aggregates the growing tokenized Real-World Assets (RWAs) from entities like BlackRock, Ondo, Mountain Protocol, M0 or Hashnote to transform them into a permissionless, on-chain verifiable, and composable stablecoin (USD0). Usual is built around the redistribution of power and ownership to users & third parties, akin to a scenario where Tether’s TVL providers would own the company and the associated revenues.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Usual dashboard.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Enter code “KWPOH” and click on “Join early access”.', '4. Follow them on Twitter and click on “Continue”.', '5. Now deposit stablecoins like USDC or USDT. You can get them from Binance.', '6. You will get USD0. USD0 is the first Liquid Deposit Token (LDT) backed 1:1 by Real-World Assets (RWA) with ultra-short maturity.', '7. Now boost your returns by depositing USD0 in liquidity pools or buying USD0++, an Enhanced T-Bill.', '8. You will start earning points in the form of pills for minting and holding USD0++.', '9. Also, provide liquidity to the USD0/USDC or USD0/USD0++ pool to earn more pills.', '10. Also, earn 10% of the pills from each referral.', '11. You will also start earning multipliers from the moment you mint your first USD0++ or provide liquidity. The earlier you mint, the more multipliers you can earn, up to a maximum of 10.5X.', '12. Usual is also live on Pendle. Earn more pills and boosts for depositing USD0++ and providing liquidity. For more information, see this article.', '13. Also, complete Galxe quests to earn more pills.', '14. Users who collect pills will get an airdrop of the USUAL token after the TGE.', '15. A total of 7.5% of the USUAL supply minted at the TGE has been allocated for the airdrop.', '16. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article.']

Title: BlastUP
Features: BlastUp is the first launchpad on the Blast blockchain. The project already showed promising results two months ago when the presale helped investors earn over 300%. BlastUp also has over $8 million in investments.
Guide: ['1. Visit the BlastUp airdrop page.', '2. Click on “Start” and complete the first step of verification.', '3. You will receive 10 booster points.', '4. Now connect your wallet.', '5. Start a quest and complete other tasks mentioned in the airdrop page.', '6. You will receive over 500 booster points for completing the tasks.', '7. Additionally, you can earn 100 booster points for inviting your friend. Also, you can earn 20% of their booster points.', '8. Once you complete the first five tasks, additional tasks will be unlocked where you can earn more points.', '9. A total of 30,000,000 BLASTUP tokens are allocated for this airdrop round.', '10. Participants will receive the airdrop based on a snapshot of the number of booster points held.']

Title: Reactor Fusion
Features: ReactorFusion is a DeFi lending platform on zkSync that received just over 2.4 million ZK tokens from airdrop #1.
Guide: ['1. Head to the Reactor Fusion dApp, connect your wallet and select zkSync Era as the network.', '2. Supply some assets and/or borrow to earn ZK tokens.', '3. If you used Reactor Fusion in the past, check the RLP dashboard to see if you’re eligible for ZK as a RLP Season 0 participant.', '4. For more information about their ZK airdrop, check out this official announcement.']

Title: Merkle Trade
Features: Merkle Trade is a decentralized trading platform that offers crypto, forex and commodities trading with leverage up to 1,000x, along with simplified UX and gamified trading features. Merkle Trade is built on the Aptos blockchain for its top-notch performance and scalability, and powered by LayerZero for asset bridging.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Merkle Trade dashboard.', '2. Connect your EVM or Aptos wallet.', '3. You will need some USDC. You can get it from Binance.', '4. Now go to “Trade”, deposit some USDC and make trades.', '5. You will start earning points based on the volume of each trade and the fee rate for the trading pair.', '6. The points will be converted to MKL tokens after each season, which can be claimed later after TGE.', '7. Go to “Earn” and deposit USDC to earn more MKL.', '8. Refer your friends to earn rebates in USDC.', '9. For more information regarding the campaign, see this page.']

Title: MYX
Features: MYX is powered by its proprietary Matching Pool Mechanism (MPM) trading engine. MYX offers an on-chain derivatives trading experience and offers USDC-margined perpetual future contracts up to 50x leverage.
Guide: ['1. Visit the MYX airdrop page.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Now you can earn free Gems through trading.', '4. You need some ETH for gas fees and USDC for trading. If you don’t have any, get them on Binance.', '5. You can then bridge the tokens using Rhino.fi to Arbitrum or Linea Chain.', '6. Also, you can earn 1,420 gems every hour for every 10,000 USDC held in your position.', '7. Long-term users will receive airdrops by simply trading and holding $MLP (liquidity pool) tokens.', '8. You can also invite your friends to receive a 20% rebate.']

Title: IBX
Features: IBX is a Decentralized Trading Platform, offering a wide variety of pairs with leverage up to 20X. Their commitment is to ensure high liquidity, minimal fees, and a broad range of trading pairs solidifies the IBX OrderBook as a fundamental platform for traders seeking to maximize the benefits of DeFi.
Guide: ['1. Visit the IBX website.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Now trade on IBX to earn free IBX points.', '4. Visit the IBX Galxe Quest page.', '5. Sign in with your X, Discord account or your wallet address.', '6. Complete easy tasks to earn free points.', '7. The top 10 traders will receive up to $30,000 USDC plus an additional $2,000 USDC.', '8. Earning IBX points will make users eligible for their upcoming airdrop.', '9. Additionally, their partner, Orderly Network, is currently running a campaign where trading on any of their DEX platforms allows you to accumulate merits for their upcoming airdrop.', '10. You can also invite your friends to receive 10% of the transaction fees paid by your referees.']

Title: Texture
Features: Texture P2P Lending protocol on Solana enables users to borrow and lend tokens directly between each other, using tokens as collateral for a fixed period of 7 days. The protocol doesn’t rely on any oracles in its design, meaning that lenders decide on how much risk (LTV) they are willing to take and are responsible for monitoring and adjusting their positions.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Texture dashboard.', '2. Connect your Solana wallet.', '3. You will need some SOL and/or other tokens on Solana. You can get them from Binance.', '4. Now go to “Lend” and lend tokens.', '5. Also, go to “Borrow” and borrow tokens.', '6. You will start earning PXLS points every time you borrow or lend on Texture.', '7. Also, get 10% of the points from each referral.', '8. They don’t have their token yet but is very likely to launch one in the future.', '9. Users who collect PXLS points will likely get an airdrop if their token goes live.']

Title: VaultCraft
Features: VaultCraft is an on-chain, permissionless protocol where anyone can spin up a vault — an automated asset strategy that optimizes returns on user-deposited funds.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Smart Vaults page.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. You need some USDT, USDC or WETH in your wallet. If you don’t have any, get them on Binance.', '4. Now you can deposit the tokens in the various smart vaults to earn free XP.', '5. Now visit the VaultCraft campaign page.', '6. Mint a VAULTRON NFT.', '7. Complete on-chain and off-chain activities to earn more XP.', '8. In this second season, participants can earn free XP by providing and locking liquidity in the VCX/WETH Balancer Pool, depositing into L2 Smart Vaults, and exercising oVCX on L2’s.', '9. VaultCraft will airdrop Vaultron NFT holders based on their accumulated XP.', '10. Airdrops will happen every 90 days for 4 periods, which can be extended by protocol governance.', '11. Users can also earn Eigenlayer points and LRT points depending on which vault they deposit into or create themselves.', '12. You can also invite your friends to earn more XP.', '13. For more information about the airdrop, visit this official announcement.', '14. VaultCraft is also running an Immunefi Bug bounty campaign with up to $150,000 in rewards.']

Title: Newtify
Features: Newtify is an AI-powered companion specifically designed for the world of cryptocurrency news. It aims to streamline the process of staying updated with relevant blockchain and crypto news by personalizing your news feed according to your preferences.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Newtify website.', '2. Download and install the Newtify app (Android/iOS).', '3. Vote in the app for over a week.', '4. Follow the Newtify X account.', '5. Keep track of their X account for updates.', '6. The winner will receive 300 USDT. They choose the winner from people who follow their X account.']

Title: Lavarage
Features: Lavarage is Solana's premier platform for leverage trading meme coins. They officially unveiled their platform at Solana Summit. Lavarage is also audited by the top 5 auditors of Code4rena.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Lavarage website.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. You can earn free Tephra for leverage trading.', '4. You will earn Tephra based on the size of your leveraged positions.', '5. Additionally, you can also earn free Tephra for completing the Zealy quests.', '6. Each XP earned on Zealy is equal to one Tephra.', '7. There’s also an off-chain points system on Discord, which is weighted the same as points earned by trading on the Lavarage platform.', '8. They also have their own NFT collection, called Lava Rock. Holding one of these NFTs could be a potential multiplier for their airdrop.', '9. You can also invite your friends to earn more points.', '10. Read the official document for more details about the points campaign.']

Title: Scroll
Features: Scroll is an EVM-equivalent ZK-rollup started in early 2021 as part of the vibrant Ethereum ecosystem. Scroll uses zkEVM as its core component to prove the native EVM execution trace and leverages a decentralized proving network to solve the efficiency problem on the prover side.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Scroll mainnet page, then add the Scroll network to Metamask.', '2. You can buy some ETH on Binance. If you don’t have any crypto funds, you can also directly deposit fiat to Binance and purchase ETH.', '3. Visit Rhino.fi, connect your ETH wallet and sign two messages (no gas fees). Scroll recommends Rhino.fi bridge on their website’s bridge list.', '4. Bridge ETH, wstETH, USDT, or USDC from the Ethereum mainnet to the Scroll mainnet to start earning marks as part of Scroll’s points program.', '5. Also, bridge weETH via Stargate to the Scroll network to earn EtherFi points and Scroll Marks.', '6. Use Scroll’s native bridge or any third party bridge to earn marks.', '7. To bridge from mainnet to Scroll in a more cost effective way, mint the Scroller NFT. Deposit some ETH on mainnet into the Scroller NFT and it will automatically bridge that balance into your main wallet on Scroll when mainnet gas prices are optimal.', '8. Mint the Scroll Canvas and collect badges.', '9. Provide liquidity to DeFi protocols such as Ambient and NURI to earn marks.', '10. Deposit eligible assets into selected lending markets such as Aave and Rho Markets to earn more marks.', '11. ‘Looping’ is a strategy enabled by leveraged borrowing where a user deposits ETH to use this asset as collateral, borrows USDC against ETH and purchase more ETH to deposit again and borrow more. Lore enables one-click looping on Scroll with up to 5x leverage, which boosts the amount of marks earned versus supplying the same amount of assets on money markets without any ‘looping’.', '12. Users can earn even more marks in the future by participating in various activities through Scroll Sessions.', '13. Marks were also awarded retroactively to users with more than $5 total gas spent on Scroll from the mainnet launch on October 10th, 2023 to April 29th, 2024 12pm UTC.', '14. Scroll also announced that marks can also be earned by bridging Kelp DAO‘s wrsETH and Tranchess assets.', '15. Try out the dApps that are already live on Scroll mainnet, like Scroll Name Service; you could thereby also become eligible for their own potential airdrops. You can check out all the dApps that are live on the Scroll ecosystem from here.', '16. Additionally, you can also bridge from Scroll to zkSync, Base, Polygon zkEVM, Manta, Linea or Optimism, which might make you eligible for other multiple potential drops.', '17. Users who interact with Scroll and collect “Marks” will likely get an airdrop if they launch their own token.', '18. Also, mint the Scroller NFT. It is an NFT that comes with its smart contract wallet. When you send ETH from Mainnet to your Scroller NFT’s wallet, it will bridge to Scroll L2 at the most gas optimal time using a custom AI prediction model. For more info, see this article.', '19. Mint other Scroll native NFT collections, such as Varonve.', '20. For more information regarding the marks campaign, see this page.', '21. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop and that they will launch their own token. It’s only speculation.', '22. Visit the Scroll testnet page.', '23. Now add Layer 1 testnet and Layer 2 testnet to Metamask.', '24. Visit the Sepolia faucet and get testnet tokens.', '25. Now visit the bridge section and send tokens from the Ethereum Sepolia to Scroll Sepolia and vice versa.', '26. Also, try out the Scroll testnet on SyncSwap; thereby, you could also become eligible for the SyncSwap speculative airdrop.', '27. Early users who’ve done testnet actions may get an airdrop if they launch their own token.', '28. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop and that they will launch their own token. It’s only speculation.']

Title: Swords & Dungeons
Features: Swords & Dungeons is a massively multiplayer online MMORPG that is fun to play, durable, and highly social, which are the most prominent features of SND. You can level up characters, forge equipment, cultivate minions, recruit companions, trade freely, team up for battles, join guilds, and participate in various time-limited events.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Swords & Dungeons Lucky Wheel Campaign page.', '2. Connect your wallet and Discord account.', '3. Spin the wheel to earn free XP and other rewards.', '4. They’ll also be launching a battle pass NFT on July 23rd, which will activate exclusive missions.', '9. 5,000,000 GOLD tokens are assigned for this airdrop round.']

Title: Rain.fi
Features: Rain.fi is the first fully decentralized, P2P liquidity protocol for NFTs, giving users the ability to lend SOL/USDC/MSOL and finance mortgages. Projects can create a pool with SOL that they can integrate on their website to lend SOL to users.
