Whether you are a lender or borrower, you can earn droplets in various ways.', '5. You can either lend, borrow or use BNPL to earn droplets.', '6. Click on “Borrow,”  enter the amount you want to collateralize, and borrow tokens.', '7. Also, go to “Lending” and lend some tokens.', '8. Lenders can earn one droplet per USD available, and borrowers can receive 2.25 droplets per USD.', '9. Users who earn “Droplets” may get an airdrop if they launch their token in the future.', '10. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop to early users or launch their own token. It’s only speculation.', '11. For more details about the program, visit this official announcement.', '12. ', '13. ', '14. ', '15. ', '16. ', '17. ', '18. ', '19. ', '20. ']

Title: Macaron
Features: Macaron is a DEX built on Bitlayer, offering the most seamless trading experience and competitive yield-making schemes for users. Macaron goes beyond a DEX, but more a collection of yield-generating tools for users including liquidity farming, staking incentives, trade-to-earn and their special community-driven Point & Airdrop program to make their users win big.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Macaron airdrop page.', '2. Connect your wallet and change the network to Bitlayer.', '3. Now click on “Verify” and verify your wallet.', '4. Then, connect your Twitter and follow them.', '5. Now, enter the invite code “cdeb5” to join the campaign.', '6. You will get 600 social points.', '7. Complete other social tasks to earn more social points.', '8. Now, make trades and provide liquidity on Macaron to earn DeFi points.', '9. You can use the Bitlayer bridge to bridge assets from other chains to Bitlayer.', '10. Also, get 15% of the points from each referral.', '11. All the earned points will be converted to Macaron tokens after TGE.', '12. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.']

Title: Clone
Features: Clone is trying to elevate Solana's DeFi ecosystem by introducing scalable, efficient markets for non-native assets. They aim to enrich the Solana blockchain with an expansive range of on-chain assets.
Guide: ['1. Clone Protocol has made an announcement that they are winding down Clone Protocol.', '2. The deprecation will be finalized (all liquidity withdrawn and clAssets refunded) by September 30th.', '3. The protocol announced that they lack the resources to continue building it.', '4. The winding down will take place in three stages.', '5. The first stage will be the extraction, followed by liquidation and then the deprecation.', '6. Liquidity providers need to close their positions by August 27.', '7. Deprecation stage will happen on August 29.', '8. During this stage, clAsset holders can use the wrapper to swap their deprecated clAssets for underlying bridged assets. These assets can then be bridged back to their original chain and sold, or sold using Jupiter on Solana if sufficient liquidity exists.']

Title: Symbiotic
Features: Symbiotic is a shared security protocol that serves as a thin coordination layer, empowering network builders to control and adapt their own (re)staking implementation in a permissionless manner.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Symbiotic website.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Now restake various assets on Symbiotic.', '4. Symbiotic has also opened wBTC and tBTC deposits to its users.', '5. They don’t have a token or points system yet.', '6. Users who interact with the platform may get an airdrop if they launch their token.', '7. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop to early users or launch their own token. It’s only speculation.']

Title: SuperBoring
Features: SuperBoring is a powerful streaming DEX that allows you to DCA between any two tokens, powered by Superfluid. It pays out more frequently than any other service without charging for gas.
Guide: ['1. Visit the SuperBoring website.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Switch the network to Base.', '4. They now have a referral campaign where users can earn a commission of BORING token by referring users to the platform.', '5. Go to the referral section to obtain your referral link.', '6. Also, interact with the platform by swapping tokens, which could potentially make you eligible for future airdrops.']

Title: Mocaverse
Features: Mocaverse is the membership NFT collection for Animoca Brands’ extraordinary family of companies, projects, investments, shareholders, and partners. This collection will represent their values surrounding Web3 and digital property rights, as well as their one-of-a-kind ecosystem.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Mocaverse airdrop claim page.', '2. Login with your account.', '3. Link a new wallet or confirm the linked giveaway wallet address.', '4. The first registration ended on July 11, 4 AM UTC.', '5. You can still register by July 29 at 4 AM UTC to receive the Round 1 $MOCA airdrop. Otherwise, it will be forfeited.', '6. Your MOCA will then be automatically staked for you. To withdraw, simply unstake to claim.', '7. Users who’ve participated in the airdrop campaign and earned at least 1,500 Realm Points (RP) are eligible for the airdrop.', '8. Users who do not unstake their Round 1 Moca ID Airdrop and continue to earn RP points will also be eligible for Round 2 airdrop.', '9. Users who held 1 Moca or Lucky Neko NFT are also eligible for the airdrop. Eligible users can claim it from here.', '10. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.']

Title: Allora
Features: The Allora Network is designed to crowdsource financial alpha produced by machine learning models, powered by our Proof of Alpha consensus mechanism. It is a machine learning (ML) model network that is incentivized to contribute to the collective optimization of some underlying objective function.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Allora Points campaign page.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Participants can earn Allora Points through a variety of on-chain and off-chain activities.', '4. These include creating topics, bringing ML models, using Allora-powered applications, community engagement and participating in community events.', '5. They don’t have a token yet, but might launch one in the future.', '6. Users who interact with the platform may get an airdrop if they launch their token.', '7. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop to early users or launch their own token. It’s only speculation.']

Title: Kroma
Features: Kroma is a project focused on scaling the Ethereum network by offering a suite of solutions to enhance its performance and usability. It aims to provide a full spectrum of scaling options, including optimized staking and reward systems.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Spectrum Kroma airdrop page.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. KSP can be earned by engaging with spETH-integrated DeFi services and games on Kroma.', '4. Additionally, users can earn EigenLayer points, WEMIX.e airdrop, ether.fi loyalty points, KRO allocations (Kroma’s upcoming token), and Kroma Spectrum points.', '5. KSP will be awarded based on the user’s contributions to the Spectrum ecosystem.', '6. These points can be exchanged for KRO tokens.', '7. Also, invite your friends to earn more points.', '8. You can obtain a referral link by holding at least 0.001 ETH on Kroma, or holding Kroma Quest Master or Guardian House NFTs.', '9. Visit the Kroma Creative Universe (KCU) page here.', '10. Connect your wallet and bridge ETH from mainnet to Kroma.', '11. Go to Oretopia to see the various campaigns and how to earn Ores.', '12. Participate in Kroma’s Pro Gamer’s Season 2 to earn Ores.', '13. Once Ores have been earned, go to the Factory, then Refinery and refine Ores into Mystic Alloys (with a success rate of 80%).', '14. Mystic Allows can then be fused into Mystic Boxes with a 60% success rate.', '15. Open Mystic Boxes to reveal Pro Gamer’s items.', '16. On July 18th, the Gate will be opened in the Kroma Creative Universe to summon Kroman PFPs.', '17. The Armory will also open on July 18th, allowing users to equip their Kromans with the Pro Gamer’s items that have been forged.', '18. For more details about the Kroma Creative Universe, check out the docs.', '19. Regularly transact on the Kroma network: Use the official bridge to send ETH to Kroma, buy and/or list NFTs on Hypermarket, and swap tokens or provide liquidity using Izumi Finance. A complete list of DApps on Kroma can be found here.', '20. Deploy your own ERC-20 token or smart contract on Kroma using Merkly or Owl.to.', '21. Users who are active within the Superchain community (Optimism, Base, etc.) will also be eligible.', '22. Holders of the Kroma Quest Master NFT, Kroma Guardian NFT or any of the Kroma OG NFTs also qualify.', '23. WEMIX community members who have earned WEMIX Community Points (WCP) will also qualify.', '24. The snapshot for KRO eligibility and allocations will be taken before the TGE and the exact timing will be disclosed at a later date.', '25. For more information about the upcoming KRO airdrop, check out this official announcement and follow Kroma on X.']

Title: Amphor
Features: Amphor is an EVM-based yield aggregator tailored for the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem. Amphor's primary objective is to offer web3 users seamless access to competitive and evolving DeFi yield strategies through a "set and forget" approach
Guide: ['1. Visit the Amphor quest page.', '2. Enter our invite code and click “Enter.”', '3. Connect your wallet.', '4. Connect your X account.', '5. Complete easy social tasks to earn free points.', '6. You can also earn fee points by inviting your friends.', '7. They don’t have a token yet, but might launch one in the future.', '8. Users who interact with the platform may get an airdrop if they launch their token.', '9. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop to early users or launch their own token. It’s only speculation.']

Title: LI.FI
Features: LI.FI is a cross-chain bridge aggregation protocol that supports any-2-any swaps by aggregating bridges and connecting them to DEXes and DEX aggregators. They're like 1inch & Paraswap for bridges, they choose the best bridge to move funds from one chain to another, but since bridges only support stable-coins and a few other coins, they have DEXes on both sides of the bridges to swap before and after the bridge, thus facilitating any-2-any swaps across chains.
Guide: ['1. Visit the LI.FI x Jumper bridge.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Select a source chain and coin.', '4. Now select the destination chain and complete the swap.', '5. You will start earning points in the form of XPs.', '6. You can check your XPs here.', '7. The XP points are updated during the first week of each month.', '8. LI.FI doesn’t have its own token yet but could launch one in the future.', '9. Users who collect XPs will likely get an airdrop if their token goes live.', '10. Also, complete their Galxe tasks.', '11. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop or that they will launch their own token. It’s only speculation.', '12. The team announced that Loyalty Pass Season 2 comes to an end this month.', '13. Additionally, season 1 and season 2 users will be getting overall XP boosts.', '14. You can also join their SuperFest and complete missions across DeFi protocols on OP Mainnet, Base, Mode, and Fraxtal. You will get 5 XP per mission and a share of 1.5M OP tokens. For more information, see this tweet.', '15. The future of the Loyalty Pass will also be revealed next week.']

Title: ZKcandy
Features: ZKcandy is a Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum, utilizing zero-knowledge proofs to accelerate transaction speed and decrease fees.
Guide: ['1. Visit the ZKcandy Voyage page.', '2. Complete the tasks to earn Candy points.', '3. Go to “Referrals” and share the unique link with friends to earn 40,000 Candy points per referral.', '4. ZKcandy have released two guides on how to earn points and play games.', '5. For more information about ZKcandy Voyage, check out this article.', '6. Visit the ZKcandy campaign page.', '7. Connect your wallet and complete easy social tasks.', '8. Go to the ZKcandy testnet page.', '9. Click on “Enter” and connect your wallet.', '10. Complete various testnet actions and tasks.', '11. The team has confirmed that 50% of the ZK allocation is set aside for testnet and mainnet incentives, social growth and social campaigns.', '14. For more details about the testnet actions, visit this official announcement.']

Title: Napier Finance
Features: Napier is a useful tool for a diverse set of actors within the DeFi space. If you have exposure to any yield in DeFi, using Napier allows you to always choose the best practices, regardless of market conditions, such as fixed rate, upfront yield, yield trading and liquidity provision.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Napier Finance points page.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. You can now complete quests to earn free Napier points.', '4. Users can earn Napier points as well as CRV/CVX emissions and EigenLayer/LRT points.', '5. You can check your Napier points from here.', '6. Title: Gate.io
Features: Gate.io is a centralized cryptocurrency exchange where users can find a large number of crypto coins and tokens to trade. The platform supports over 1700 cryptocurrencies with over 2500 trading pairs. The project occupies one of the leading positions in terms of trading volume (more than 12 billion dollars in trading volume daily) and supports spot and margin trading. It also expanded services to other markets, including options, futures, and derivatives for investors.
Guide: ['1. Create an account at Gate.io.', '2. Complete your KYC2 verification.', '3. If you are an existing user, ensure to have $100 USDT in your account.', '4. If you are a new user, make sure to deposit $100 USDT to participate in the competition.', '5. A total of $3,5000,000 is allocated for the team competition reward.', '6. Visit the Gate.io team competition page and register by joining our team.', '7. Teams participating in the competition will compete in two time periods.', '8. There will be a first half and a second half, with each half lasting two weeks.', '9. The first half of the competition runs from July 19, 2024, to August 1, 2024. Title: Rho Markets

Rho Markets primarily offers lending services for users, including LRT assets as well as mainstream assets like ETH and wBTC. Additionally, users will be able to stake $RATE to earn higher yields.

The available assets are ETH, STONE, USDC, USDT, wstETH and solvBTC.b.', '3. Click on Supply for the pool you want to deposit to and confirm the transaction.', '4. The more you supply and the longer your deposit is in the lending pool, the more RXP you can earn.', '5. Also, borrow from Rho Markets to earn RXP.', '6. The more you borrow and longer the you hold, the more RXP you can earn.', '7. Deposit more than 0.05 ETH (or equivalent in stables) to collect “Rho Pets”.', '8. Each asset you supply is associated with a different Rho Pet.', '9. Users who supply more than 0.10 ETH will receive an exclusive invitation code. If a user invites others who supplies at least 0.05 ETH, the inviter receives 5% of the invited person’s points.', '10. In phase 1, points are allocated based on the user’s supply rate, borrow rate and number of users they invite.', '11. In phase 2, pet NFTs and team mode will be introduced to make the airdrop activities more fun and engaging.', '12. For more information about the Loyalty Points Program, check out this official announcement.', '13. To learn more about Rho Pets, check out the Rho Markets docs.', '14. Follow Rho Markets on X and turn on notification for further updates.']

So continue to trade on Zeta and collect Z-Score to be eligible for future airdrops.', '21. For more information regarding future airdrop rewards, see this page.']

Title: Optopia

Title: Blast
Features: Blast is an L2 with native yield for ETH and stablecoins. Blast yield comes from ETH staking and RWA protocols. The yield from these decentralized protocols is passed back to Blast users automatically. The default interest rate on other L2s is 0%. On Blast, it's 4% for ETH and 5% for stablecoins. Yield makes it possible to create new revenue streams and provide novel rewards for end-users. Users transact in ETH. Dapps are built around ETH. Blast was designed from the ground up so that ETH itself is natively rebasing on the L2.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Blast airdrop claim page.', '2. Click on “Sign in to claim your airdrop”.', '3. Connect your wallet.', '4. Now click on “Claim Airdrop”.', '5. Now watch a video about Blast.', '6. Then, you will see the number of tokens you’re eligible to claim.', '7. Tweet the mentioned tweet and then install the Blast App.', '8. You will get four codewords from the app.', '9. Submit the codewords to the claim page.', '10. Now, go back to the app to claim your tokens.', '11. The tokens will then be sent automatically sent to your wallet.', '12. Eligible users have 30 days to claim the tokens.', '13. Users that bridged ETH or USDB to Blast bootstrapped the initial liquidity on the Blast ecosystem and earned Blast Points throughout Phase 1. These users will be rewarded with 7% of the total BLAST supply.', '14. Users that contributed to the success of Dapps earned Blast Gold and will be rewarded with 7% of the total BLAST supply', '15. The Blur Foundation will receive 3% of the total BLAST supply to distribute to the Blur community for both retroactive and future airdrops.', '16. The top 1,000 wallets are vested over six months.', '17. You will need to reach certain point milestones to unlock the vested tokens.', '18. Phase 2 has also started, so continue to bridge and collect points to be eligible for future phases.', '19. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this tweet.', '20. Visit the Blast website.', '21. You will need an invite code to access the platform.', '22. Enter our exclusive unlimited invite code “WS7XR” and access the platform.', '23. Follow them on Twitter and Discord and connect your wallet.', '24. Head to the Bridge section and transfer ETH or other tokens from Ethereum to Blast L2.', '25. You will need some ETH or other tokens supported on Blast to be eligible to bridge. You can get them on Binance.', '26. You will now start earning Blast points based on the amount you have bridged.', '27. You will also earn a 4% interest rate for ETH and 5% for stablecoins, whereas on other L2s, it’s 0%.', '28. A total of 10 billion BLAST tokens have been allocated for Phase 2. 50% are allocated for Blast points, and the remaining 50% for Blast Gold.', '29. So continue earning in Phase 2 for future airdrops.', '30. Developer points are called Blast Gold, and all the top projects have already allocated Blast Gold to its users. So, the users who interact with dApps on Blast will also get Blast Gold.', '31. Also, earn more points and Blast Gold from each referral.', '32. Only new users invited in Phase 2 will contribute towards invite bonuses in Phase 2.', '33. Participate in the Multiplier campaign to increase your points. Multipliers can be earned by using certain highlighted Dapps.', '34. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this article.']

Title: Summer.fi
Features: Summer.fi is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform that allows users to borrow, lend, and multiply their favorite crypto assets such as ETH, WBTC, DAI, and USDC, utilizing industry-leading automation tools for safety and ease. It offers automated protection against liquidation, position management, and rewards users with $RAYS for participating in its ecosystem.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Summer.fi website.', '2. Connect your wallet.', '3. Click on claim RAYS. You will be able to claim RAYS if you are eligible.', '4. The snapshot of all Summer.fi users and wallets that could be eligible for the points campaign was taken on June 18, 2024.', '5. All non-summer users who are eligible for RAYS will have to open a position of $500 and keep it open for more than 14 days before September 20, 2024.', '6. Active wallet owners receive 100 $RAYS for owning a non-custodial wallet on Mainnet, Arbitrum, Optimism or Base with at least 0.2 ETH.', '7. DeFi users receive 200 $RAYS per protocol for having an active position on a supported protocol and network.', '8. Summer.fi Users receive 500 $RAYS for each protocol they have ever interacted with through Summer.fi since June 2021.', '9. You can also earn RAYS by using Summer.fi supported protocols by Borrowing, Earning, or Multiplying.', '10. Open any Borrow, Multiply, or Earn position to get $RAYS.', '11. $RAYS accrue per $ managed per second, which means a base rate of approximately 690 $RAYS per $10k per year.', '12. Positions with less than $10k net value will earn less than the 690 $RAYS per $10k per year.', '13. You can also earn free RAYS for inviting your friends.', '14. Visit their official airdrop announcement to read about all the ways to earn RAYS.']

Title: nftperp
Features: nftperp is an open-source DeFi platform enabling users to trade on the price of NFT collections like Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks using perpetual futures contracts, with all transactions in ETH. With perpetual futures, you don’t need real NFTs as collateral. The perpetual futures contracts simply track the floor price of the underlying NFT collection, Allowing traders to come to the exchange with ETH and leave with ETH.

Make a long or short trades.', '8. You will start earning vNFTP token vouchers.', '9. Also get more vNFTP for referring your friends.', '10. You will also start earning Blast points and Blast Gold for trading on nftperp.', '13. For more information regarding the campaign, see this article.']

Title: Hyperlane
Features: Hyperlane is the first universal and permissionless interoperability layer built for the modular blockchain stack. Anyone can permissionlessly deploy hyperlane to any blockchain environment, whether it is a layer 1, rollup, or app-chain, allowing that chain to communicate seamlessly with any other chain on which Hyperlane has been deployed. Hyperlane is designed with modularity in mind. Notably, its interchain security modules give developers control over their security model, allowing them to configure, compose, and customize security according to the needs of their application.

Experiment with new integrations as announced by Hyperlane Twitter and Airdrops.io Announcements.', '30. Stake on Celestia', '31. Experiment with new integrations as announced by Hyperlane Twitter and Airdrops.io Announcements.']

Title: NURI Exchange
Features: NURI Exchange is a DEX on the Scroll network which was inspired by RAMSES on Arbitrum. As an authorised fork of RAMSES that was audited by Yearn Academy's auditing arm, NURI inherits the security of their proprietary Concentrated Liquidity ve(3,3) implementation. Liquidity providers can earn PTL emissions which are non-transferable and will be converted to NURI at a later date. Also, Scroll markes can be earned as part of Scroll's Session One.
Guide: ['1. Visit NURI exchange, connect your wallet and switch network to Scroll.', '2. Select from ones of the pools to provide liquidity to.', '3. It’s recommended to supply liquidity to the USDC/USDT pool to avoid exposure to volatility.', '4. Alternatively, if you’re bullish on ETH, it’s recommended to supply liquidity to the ETH/wstETH pool.', '5. Click on “Deposit” for the desired pool.', '6. Select from one of the range types: full, wide, narrow or degen.', '7. The wider the ranges, the less risk you take but also results in smaller rewards. Narrow and degen require much more active management, but will yield higher rewards.', '8. It’s recommended to use the wide range type so you don’t have to monitor your position that often.', '9. Enter the amounts of the two assets that will be supplied to the pool.', '10. Sign the approval transaction to allow the dapp to use your assets and then confirm your deposits with your wallet.', '11. Since PTL is a liquidity-based airdrop, it’s important to supply a large amount (more than $5,000) to secure a larger allocation.', '12. The lifecycle of your liquidity position is also important. Liquidity providers that have supplied assets for a longer duration will earn more PTL.', '13. Scroll marks can also be earned for providing liquidity to the NURI Exchange.', '14. Follow NURI on X for further updates.']

Title: Kinetix Finance
Features: Kinetix is building a comprehensive community-focused DeFi hub designed exclusively for the Kava ecosystem. The Kinetix team is acutely aware of the potential pitfalls of the current crop of centralized trading solutions. While such solutions often offer a more holistic trading experience, including more advanced tooling, leverage, and a variety of tradable assets, they lack transparency and are vulnerable to systemic vulnerabilities.

Title: LayerZero
Features: LayerZero is an omnichain interoperability protocol designed for lightweight message passing across chains. LayerZero provides authentic and guaranteed message delivery with configurable trustlessness. It is a “blockchain of blockchains” that allows other blockchain networks to communicate directly and in a trustless manner.
Guide: ['1. Visit the LayerZero airdrop claim page.', '2. Connect your EVM or Aptos wallet.', '3. If you’re eligible, you will see the number of tokens you can claim.', '4. Now select a claim network.', '5. Eligible users can claim from Ethereum, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, Polygon, BNB Chain, and Avalanche.', '6. To claim the tokens, users must donate $0.10 in USDC, USDT, or native ETH per ZRO. If you don’t already have these tokens, you can get them from Binance.', '7. Now click on “Claim” to claim your tokens.', '8. Various users who interacted with the Layerzero protocol by Snapshot #1 are eligible for the airdrop. The Snapshot #1 was taken on May 1st, 2024.', '9. The eligibility is mainly divided into two categories: LayerZero Core and Protocol RFP.', '10. LayerZero Core is designed to retroactively reward users for their activity on the protocol. Distribution is based on protocol fees paid. All users who transacted before the snapshot are eligible, with a minimum allocation of 25 ZRO and a maximum of 5,000 ZRO.', '11. Protocol RFP are 211 projects selected by LayerZero to distribute ZRO allocation to their respective communities, with a minimum allocation of 5 ZRO and a maximum allocation of 10,000 ZRO. Allocations are determined based on several factors, including the number of messages sent before and after the snapshot, the number of days since the first message was sent on LayerZero, and the application category (OApp, OFT, ONFT).', '12. Eligible users must claim the tokens by September 20th. Otherwise, all unclaimed ZRO will be redistributed to LayerZero core users after the claim process ends.', '13. A total of 8.5% of ZRO supply has been allocated for the current airdrop, with an additional 15.3% of ZRO supply being reserved for future incentives.', '14. Connect your wallet and select your product depending on your market view: rangebound if you think the BTC or ETH market will go sideways, bull trend if you are bullish on BTC or ETH, or bear trend if you are bearish on BTC or ETH.', '4. Title: ZKsync
Features: zkSync is a ZK rollup, a trustless protocol that uses cryptographic validity proofs to provide scalable and low-cost transactions on Ethereum. In zkSync, computation is performed off-chain and most data is stored off-chain as well. As all transactions are proven on the Ethereum mainchain, users enjoy the same security level as in Ethereum.
Guide: ['1. Visit the ZKsync airdrop claim page.', '2. Submit your wallet address or GitHub username and click on “Check”.', '3. If you’re eligible, then you will be able to connect your wallet.', '4. Now watch a video about the ZK token, delegate your votes, and claim the tokens.', '5. A total of 695,232 wallets are eligible for the airdrop.', '6. Eligibility and allocations for the airdrop were based on the snapshot taken on March 24th, 2024, at 0:00 UTC, which was the one-year anniversary of the ZKsync era mainnet launch.', '7. The full eligibility list can be found in this blog article.', '8. For usage-based airdrop, each eligible wallet can receive a minimum of 450 ZK and a maximum of 100,000 ZK tokens.', '9. Eligible users of contribution-based airdrop could receive additional allocations.', '10. Eligible users have until January 3, 2025 to claim the tokens.', '11. Wave 2 of the airdrop for ZKsync Native Project Contributors, External Contributors and Protocol Guild will begin on June 24th 2024.', '12. GitHub Developers and ZKsync GitHub Discussion Helpers are required to associate their wallet address to their GitHub handle by June 25th 00:00 Central European Summer Time (CEST) to be eligible.', '13. The official airdrop announcement clarified that “~67% of ZK will go to the community. 17.5% of the overall supply will be distributed through a one-time airdrop. The rest will be distributed over time, through ecosystem initiatives, managed by the ZKsync Foundation, and the ZK Nation governance process, to support a growing ecosystem as new users come onchain.”', '14. It’s recommended to HODL your original allocation and delegate your ZK tokens for governance to potentially receive further ZK airdrops in the future. Optimism’s airdrop #3 awarded users who delegated tokens over a 6-month period (January 20th to July 20th, 2023) with OP, and a bonus was given to addresses who delegated to a delegate who voted in Optimism governance. It’s possible that ZKsync will do something similar to reward positive sum governance.', '15. Some other potential qualifiers for future airdrops could be: i) continue transacting regularly on ZkSync (especially providing liquidity to DeFi protocols) and ii) being a power user of one of the top dApps.', '16. ZKsync has also launched a six-week campaign called ZK Fest, which will run from Aug 5 to Sep 13. ZK Fest is a music-festival-themed campaign to showcase projects building on ZKsync through digital events and activities involving gaming, NFT projects, DeFi protocols, and builders on the Elastic Chain. Participate in these activities to win various rewards.', '17. Turn on notifications for the ZKsync and ZK Nation accounts on X to monitor for updates and act on anything that they mention or highlight.']

Features: Berachain is a high-performance EVM-compatible blockchain built on Proof-of-Liquidity consensus. Proof-of-Liquidity is a novel consensus mechanism that aims to align network incentives, creating strong synergy between Berachain validators and the ecosystem of projects. Berachain's technology is built on Polaris, a high-performance blockchain framework for building EVM-compatible chains on-top of the CometBFT consensus engine.
Guide: ['1. Visit the Berachain testnet dApps page.', '2. Click on the faucet icon from the top right and claim testnet BERA tokens.', '3. Now visit Berachain’s Dex.', '4. Connect your wallet.', '5. Change the network to Berachain testnet.', '6. Go to “Swap” and swap BERA for some HONEY and other tokens.', '7. Go to “Pools” and provide liquidity.', '8. Now visit “Honey” and mint some HONEY tokens.', '9. Proceed to BERPS, Berachain’s leverage trading platform.', '10. Connect your wallet.', '11. Make long and short trades.', '12. Go to “Vaults” and stake some HONEY.', '13. Now, visit “BEND” and supply or borrow assets.', '14. Berachain has three tokens: BERA, BGT and HONEY.', '15. BERA is the network token that would be used for paying gas etc, while BGT is a governance token that is non-transferrable and can only be acquired by depositing liquidity in the native BEX. BGT can also be burned 1:1 for BERA, and HONEY is the stablecoin of Berachain.', '16. The co-founder has confirmed that the testnets are incentivized, so the testnet participants will likely receive a BERA airdrop when the mainnet goes live.', '17. For more information regarding BERA, BGT and HONEY, see the documentation section.', '18. Bera has also released some new steps that can be completed for minting NFTs via Intract Quests.', '19. Visit the Intract Quests page and complete the quests to earn free XP.', '20. For more information regarding the announcement, see this Medium article.', '21. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop to early users. It’s only speculation.']

Title: Die Last

Send the crafted message to Da Vinci’s Parachute Factory.
You can find this in the Message Recipients list in the game.', '13. Send the crafted message to Da Vinci’s Parachute Factory.', '14. You can find this in the Message Recipients list in the game.', '15. Mint the NFT.

Visit the Die Last website to claim your NFT.', '16. Da Vinci’s Parachute Factory will generate an in-game NFT with unique parameters.', '17. Visit the Die Last website to claim your NFT.', '18. Note that the airdrop operates on a first-come-first-served basis.', '19. Also participate in the quest campaign with Bitget Wallet and DeGame. Title: Rabby Wallet
Features: Rabby Wallet is an open source browser plugin for the DeFi ecosystem, providing users with a better-to-use and more secure multi-chain experience. It offers a smooth multi-chain experience by automatically switching to the corresponding chain based on your visited Web3 dApp. Their security rule engine lets you check errors and risks before signing transactions.

Make sure to enter “GETAIRDROPS” in the referral code field.', '5. Now engage in on-chain activities, make swaps, etc, to start earning points.', '6. For more information regarding the points program, see this tweet.', '9. They don’t have their own token yet but have hinted at rewarding the users.', '10. You will also get points if you’re new to Rabby.', '12. Season 2 ends on June 30th at 23:59 (UTC+0).', '13. Users who accumulate points in their wallet may receive an airdrop if they launch their own token.', '14. Since the wallet is by DeBank, using it may make you eligible for the DeBank speculative airdrop as well.', '15. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop and that they will launch their own token. It’s only speculation.']

For more details about the airdrop, visit this official reward page.']

Title: Taiko

Its purpose is to allow developers and users of dApps developed for Ethereum L1 to be used on Taiko without any changes. As a result, dApps can be easily deployed to L2, inheriting Ethereum's security while incurring lower transaction fees than on L1.

Title: Revert

Title: Hyperliquid
Features: Hyperliquid is a performant L1 optimized from the ground up. The vision is a fully onchain open financial system with user built applications interfacing with performant native components, all without compromising end user experience. The flagship native application is a fully onchain order book perpetuals exchange, the Hyperliquid DEX. Further developments include a native token standard, spot trading, permissionless liquidity, etc.
Guide: ['1. Head to Hyperliquid and connect your wallet.', '2. Bridge some USDC to Arbitrum and then deposit.', '3. Trade spot assets to begin earning points for the L1 season.', '4. Go to “Trade”, “Select instrument” then click on “Spot” to see the assets available to trade.', '5. The higher the volume traded on spot assets, the more points you’ll likely earn.', '6. Accumulate the highest amount of your country’s token to become president.', '5. As president you can decide strategic actions, including the decision to nuke a rival country if you win.', '6. The remaining 50% will be randomly distributed to another country on the map.', '12. Even if you don’t play, your address will be saved in a special list if you interact with them by chatting in their global chat.', '13. The team has recently confirmed that 1% of the supply from every country will be reserved for giveaways and airdrops.', '14. The team has also confirmed a points campaign. Points can be earned in 4 ways: 1) for country decorations (pay ~$5 in ETH to decorate any country with your own image), 2) nuke victims (points given to country token holders that get nuked out of the game), 3) trading (buying/selling country tokens) and 4) referrals.']

This innovative feature captures users individual gaming journey, transforming their achievements into a collection of personalized rewards and experiences.

Title: Base Name Service

If you don’t have any crypto funds, you can also directly deposit fiat to Binance and purchase ETH.', '4. Visit Rhino.fi, connect your ERC-20 wallet and sign two messages (no gas fees). Base recommends Rhino.fi bridge on their website’s bridge list.', '5.  Bridge your ETH from the Ethereum mainnet or the network you’ve ETH into the Base mainnet.', '6. Now, go back to Base Names Service and buy a domain.', '7. You will receive 500 points for purchasing a domain for a year. The longer the duration, the more points you’ll earn.', '8. You can earn a one-year domain renewal or purchase a new domain by collecting 2,000 points.', '9. They don’t have their own token yet but could launch one in the future.', '10. Early users who’ve bought a domain may get an airdrop if they launch their own token.', '11. Please note that there is no guarantee that they will do an airdrop and that they will launch their own token. It’s only speculation.']

Title: Ethena

Title: Pryzm

Title: COTI
Features: COTI is the fastest and lightest confidentiality layer on Ethereum. Powered by the breakthrough cryptographic protocol Garbled Circuits and secured by Ethereum, COTI introduces the most advanced and compliant solution for data protection on the public blockchain. Paving the way for the next wave of Web3 innovation and adoption, COTI unlocks a whole new world of use cases, including confidential transactions, Artificial Intelligence, DeFi, decentralized identification, and more.

Using the native COTI tokens requires only 1 COTI (not including fees), but if you’re using COTI on ERC20, you’ll need at least 5,000 COTI tokens.', '5. Now go to “Deposits” and click on “Deposit Now”.', '6. Select the number of COTI you want to deposit.', '7. Select a Multiplier. You can choose multipliers of 2X, 4X, or 8X or leave the default 1X setting. Higher multipliers attract a higher APY but come with an increased risk of liquidation.', '8. Select the locking duration. Higher locking periods attract a higher APY.', '9. Then click on “New Deposit” and submit your transaction.', '10. You will get free COTI based on a combination of your current APY and deposit conditions such as your multiplier and locking period plus your time and activity in the Treasury.', '11. For every Treasury deposit, you’ll start accumulating APY rewards that are redeemable at any given time. On top of that, you’ll get a share of 40M COTI V2 Tokens rewards that will be distributed after the COTI V2 TGE, which is planned for Q4 this year.', '12. For more information regarding the airdrop, see this Medium article.']

Title: Kelp DAO

Title: Tortuga Finance

The protocol has two primary objectives: first, to increase the total staked APT coins by facilitating easier participation in APT staking for end users. Secondly, it aims to promote a fairer distribution of voting power.

Title: BNB Chain
Features: BNB Chain’s mission is to build the infrastructure powering the world’s parallel virtual ecosystem. BNB Chain is comprised of BNB Beacon Chain (previously Binance Chain) - BNB Chain Governance (Staking, Voting) and BNB Smart Chain (BSC) (Previously Binance Smart Chain) - EVM-compatible, providing consensus layers, with hubs to multi-chains. Along with fueling transactions on BNB Chain (similar to gas on Ethereum), BNB also acts as a governance token. Holding BNB gives you the right to make your voice heard and is necessary to participate in BNB Chain’s decentralized on-chain governance.
Guide:
['1. Visit the BNB Chain airdrop eligibility checking page.', '2. Scroll down and click on “Check eligibility”.', '3. Connect your wallet.', '4. If you’re eligible, you will see a confirmation that you’re eligible for Level 1 or Level 2 rewards.', '5. Level 1 requirements for BSC users are:
The number of on-chain transactions is greater than or equal to 50, but less than or equal to 5000.
The number of addresses interacted with is greater than or equal to 10, but less than or equal to 100.
The unique active days (with on-chain transactions) are greater than or equal to 30 days.
The address is not a smart contract.
The address is with a BNB balance greater than or equal to 0.05.
The address is not a project address.', '6. The number of on-chain transactions is greater than or equal to 50, but less than or equal to 5000.', '7.
